Activity: Quick market news scan. Check emails for urgent items.
Respond to emails and finalize any outstanding tasks. Review the week's accomplishments and identify areas for improvement.

Hold a team meeting with all key stakeholders (@qres-1, @qres-2, @qres-3, @sdev-1, @sdev-2, @dsde-1, @dsde-2, @larch-1, @devops-1, @comp-1, @pm-1, @mkt-1, @ir-1, @onbd-1, @facc-1, @facc-2) to review progress, address any roadblocks, and ensure alignment on the fund's launch timeline. Send email to all team members for a progress review and alignment meeting.
Based on the team meeting, adjust the project plan and timelines as needed. Communicate any changes to all relevant stakeholders.

Prepare a final report summarizing the week's activities, including the strategy selection, compliance plan, technical implementation progress, and marketing initiatives. Share the report with the executive team.
Lunch Break. Team lunch to celebrate progress.
Meet individually with team leads (e.g., @larch-1, @qres-1, @dsde-1) to provide feedback and discuss individual performance. Offer coaching and support.
Review the fund's risk management framework with the Quantitative Research team. Implement appropriate risk controls and monitoring procedures. Final check before weekend.
Plan for the next week. Identify key priorities and schedule meetings. Delegate responsibilities as needed.
Final email check. Tidy up the office. Prepare for a relaxing weekend.
